hero.title: FullStack developer specialized in modern web technologies
hero.subTitle: Look at my work

about.title: About Me
about.subTitle: Hello, I'm Dario, nice to meet you.
about.text_1: I'm a full-stack developer with experience working on real-world projects, both in the JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem (Node.js, React, Next.js, NestJS) and in Java with SpringBoot. I specialize in designing robust architectures, optimizing business logic, and creating modern and functional interfaces.
about.text_2: I'm characterized by proactivity, clear communication, and the ability to solve problems independently or in a team. I enjoy tackling technical challenges with an analytical and results-oriented mindset.
about.text_3: I'm always looking for new projects and opportunities where I can provide scalable and efficient solutions that generate real-world impact.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.subTitle: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project in mind or just want to say hello, don't hesitate to contact me!
